description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Innocents Abroad, or the New Pilgrims' Progress; being some account of the steamship Quaker City's pleasure excursion to Europe and the Holy Land ... With two hundred and thirty-four illustrations. By Mark Twain, Samuel L. Clemens, etc", "Single Works" Author: CLEMENS, Samuel Langhorne. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10026.dd.8." Page: 406 Place of Publishing: Hartford Date of Publishing: 1869 Publisher: American Publishing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000721557 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
